name: EmysTK
short_description:
Emys Toolkit (EmysTK) is a collection of tools to be used in the development of software and behavior for the EMYS robot, in the LIREC project. Please visit www.lirec.eu for more information!


Acknowledgements:

GAIPS:
(Intelligent Agents and Synthetic Characters Group)
www.gaips.inesc-id.pt

LIREC (LIving with Robots and Embodied Companions):
www.lirec.eu

IST (Instituto Superior Técnico / Technical University of Lisbon)
www.ist.utl.pt

Heriot-Watt University Edinburgh
http://www.hw.ac.uk/
